name: PowassanVirusDiseaseTestsForPowassanVirusAntibodyQualitative
title: Powassan Virus Disease (Tests for Powassan Virus Antibody [Qualitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Powassan antibody (qualitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Powassan),(Exclusion Criteria: - Panel tests, interpretation tests
- All other Arboviral conditions)
